name: The Fool
lore: Pure potential, leap into the abyss, Aleph breath of beginning

name: The Magician
lore: Will manifested, Mercury's messenger, tools of transformation

name: High Priestess
lore: Veiled wisdom, lunar mysteries, guardian of thresholds

name: The Empress
lore: Venus fertile, creative abundance, nature's sovereignty

name: The Emperor
lore: Cubic throne, Mars authority, structure and order

name: Hierophant
lore: Taurus teaching, bridge between worlds, sacred tradition

name: The Lovers
lore: Zayin sword divides, conscious choice, sacred union

name: The Chariot
lore: Cancer's shell, sphinx guardians, triumphant will

name: Strength
lore: Serpent power, Leo's courage, infinite lemniscate

name: Hermit
lore: Virgo's lamp, Yod hand of God, inner guidance

name: Wheel of Fortune
lore: Jupiter's expansion, karma cycles, sphinx wisdom

name: Justice
lore: Libra's balance, Lamed ox-goad, karmic adjustment

name: Hanged Man
lore: Neptune's water, suspended mind, reversal wisdom

name: Death
lore: Scorpio transformation, Nun fish, ego dissolution

name: Temperance
lore: Sagittarius arrow, alchemical mixture, middle path

name: Devil
lore: Capricorn matter, Ayin eye opens, shadow integration

name: Tower
lore: Mars lightning, false crown falls, liberation shock

name: Star
lore: Aquarius pours, seven chakras, cosmic consciousness

name: Moon
lore: Pisces dreams, Qoph back of head, astral journey

name: Sun
lore: Solar child, Resh head renewal, conscious joy

name: Judgement
lore: Pluto rises, Shin tooth/fire, eternal calling

name: World
lore: Saturn completes, Tau cross manifest, cosmic dance

name: Kether
lore: Crown unity, source point, pure will undifferentiated

name: Chokmah
lore: Wisdom force, Zodiac sphere, active principle

name: Binah
lore: Understanding form, Saturn's restriction, divine mother

name: Chesed
lore: Jupiter mercy, building power, benevolent king

name: Geburah
lore: Mars severity, destroying force, necessary restriction

name: Tiphareth
lore: Solar beauty, Christ center, harmonious balance

name: Netzach
lore: Venus victory, desire nature, creative force

name: Hod
lore: Mercury splendor, mental forms, magical image

name: Yesod
lore: Lunar foundation, astral light, subconscious machinery

name: Malkuth
lore: Kingdom manifest, four elements, physical completion

name: Aleph Path
lore: Fool's breath, Kether to Chokmah, spirit descends

name: Beth Path
lore: Magician's house, Kether to Binah, will directed

name: Gimel Path
lore: Priestess veil, Kether to Tiphareth, unity to beauty

name: Daleth Path
lore: Empress door, Chokmah to Binah, wisdom meets form

name: Samekh Path
lore: Temperance arrow, Tiphareth to Yesod, testing ground

name: Ayin Path
lore: Devil's eye, Tiphareth to Hod, material test

name: Peh Path
lore: Tower's mouth, Netzach to Hod, force meets form

name: Tzaddi Path
lore: Star's hook, Netzach to Yesod, desire crystallizes

name: Qoph Path
lore: Moon's sleep, Netzach to Malkuth, dream manifest

name: Shin Path
lore: Judgement fire, Hod to Malkuth, mind materializes

name: Tau Path
lore: World's cross, Yesod to Malkuth, foundation complete
